attributes.action: UK Government to release COVID19 recovery rates.
attributes.additional_details: The UK deserves to know in this time of crisis the full extent of risk. Recovery rate would be very helpful in understanding risk.
attributes.background: To give clear information on recovery rates from COVID19. The only information available are death rates, which are under review due to potential reporting errors. The recovery rate are equally important in imparting the seriousness of the disease.
